p: The initial Coulombic efficiency of the three binders was in the order of (PAA- g-PEG: 74.2%), (PAU- g-PEG: 70.4%) and (PAA: 51.6%). The two electrodes fabricated from PEG-grafted copolymers, PAA- g-PEG and PAU- g-PEG, showed good Coulombic efficiency, higher than 70% (Fig.Â 4b). The PAA- g-PEG electrode had a slightly higher Coulombic efficiency than the PAU- g-PEG electrode due to differences in the activation of the active material, that is Si, arising from differences in electrolyte uptake.
